entry.title: Merit 54197 - Bore Polishers Aluminum Oxide 240 grit 5/8 Inch To 1 Inch 08834154197
entry.summary:
Vendor: Merit
Type: Bore Polishers
Price: 6.59

[shortdesc]
  • Bore polishers are used for deburring, cleaning and polishing of the interior diameters of cylinders, tubes and hydraulic fittings
  • The flaps automatically adjust to the inside diameter, polishing the entire surface with one pass
  • A self-centering, spring action design gives a fast and easy way to handle all inside diameter jobs.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Merit
    Bore Diameter 5/8 Inch to 1 Inch
    Grit 240
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Product Type Bore Polishers

    Product Information

  • For 5/8 In
  • to 1 In
  • interior diameter bores
  • 3 Abrasive packs 1-1/2 In
  • wide, bonded to hub
  • Use with QC-5 mandrel part no
  • 08834154182
  • Extension mandrels are available for deep holes
    		•
